categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Attack on the Kuliquo belt asteroid mines

During the Galactic Civil War as a part of Operation Ringbreaker, 20 soldiers of the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry launched an attack on the Kuliquo belt in 3 ABY, an Imperial mining asteroid field. The soldiers were personally selected by Captain Hazram Namir to sabotage machinery located in an airless and lightless death trap.
The attack on the Kuliquo belt asteroid mines first appeared in Alexander Freed's 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company.
